reviewText: This is a nice cheap 4 movie combo pack. Liar Liar/ Bruce Almighty on one disk and Happy Gilmore/ Billy Madison on another. Fans can add these to their collections for a very decent price. The only thing I would have done differently would be to replace Billy Madison with "Mr. Deeds".
Title: N/A

reviewText: Frankly I bought this because of Liar Liar and Bruce Almighty (not a fan of these Sandler films but the family is, so...).  They work great and are subtitled so no one should have any problems.
Title: N/A

reviewText: You get all 4 classic comedy movies on DVD in 1 small package.I was buying these to upgrade some VHS copies to DVD.Since they're comedies and not really special effect/surround sound oriented, I bought this set instead of the Blu-rays.This saved me a lot of money.The widescreen format fits the screen nicely and the digital sound is great.4 funny movies for a seriously great price!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I have watched this flick a number of times just for the funny scenes with Jim Carey.and the rest of the cast.....
Title: N/A

reviewText: My 11 year old son was over the moon when this arrived. 4 of his fave flicks for just $10! A GREAT value!
summary: The biggest bang for your buck!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Four classic comedies with one purchase Liar Liar and Bruce Almighty are just classic Jim Carrey movies.  Happy Gilmore and Billy Madison are classic Adam Sandler movies, and together they are just full of fun and laughs.
Title: N/A

reviewText: 4 terrific movies and all in one collection. This was a great purchase and I look forward to having the convenience of watching them whenever I want.
